description: The Blue Hawaii cocktail is sweet and fruity. This drink is often served with pineapple juice, but you can also use coconut cream or orange juice to get the same effect. Mixed together, this creates a blue-colored drink that will remind you of sitting on a beach somewhere tropical!
name: Blue Hawaii
recipeIngredient: Pineapple wedge and cocktail umbrella for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: Combine blue curaçao, vodka, rum, and sweet & sour mix in  a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake until chilled.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine blue curaçao, vodka, rum, and sweet & sour mix in  a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake until chilled.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain into an ice-filled hurricane glass or tumbler.
recipeInstructions.text: Strain into an ice-filled hurricane glass or tumbler.

recipeInstructions.name: Top up with pineapple juice then garnish to taste!
